title: Show the data

steps.hint: Let’s get the weather with **type** `weather = get 'weather', location`
We're going write some of the data we just got onto the screen of our app. Let’s use `font 30`.
The text should also be easy to read, so we’ll make it bold with `bold true`

Next, we’ll write the text. Part of the text should be the same all the time, but we also want it to *vary* some of the time, so we’ll use the `location` variable. **Type** `text 'Wind speed in ' + location`
Now lets draw the speed, it should appear just below the current text. Lets move into position with `move 0, 120`
The speed should be big, so we’ll set it with `font 100`
Again, what we want to appear will change all the time, so we’ll use text from the data, and combine it with text that always stays the same. **Type** `text weather.wind.speed + 'mph'`

completion_text: Amazing! Change the location to see wind speeds around the world.
